name: KuaiZip Compressed File
summary: Learn about .KZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: KuaiZip is a Chinese program and is not localized in English, making it difficult for non-Chinese speakers to use. Therefore, you most likely will only use the program if you receive a compressed KZ file from a friend or coworker and need to extract the contents from the archive.

description: A KZ file is a compressed archive created by KuaiZip, a free file compression and decompression utility. It is compressed using a proprietary format that can increase the compression ratio five to thirty percent over standard .RAR compression and ten percent over .7Z compression.
